name: Neo Zipper Brief
description: Matte finish, clean lines, and a fit that sits right. Built for nights out and last-call confidence.

name: ManPak Neoprene Jock
description: High-compression comfort with hardware details that pop. Feels premium—looks expensive.

name: UGS Night Brief
description: Minimal, sharp, and unapologetic. Designed to flex under streetlights and camera flash.

name: UGS Grey Jockstrap
description: Performance stretch with a sculpted cut. Comfortable enough to live in; bold enough to show off.

name: Slingshot Thong
description: Soft-touch fabric, structured seams, and a silhouette that turns heads. No compromises.

name: Tropx Swim Brief
description: Breathable mesh with a heavyweight feel. The kind of piece people ask about.

name: Mesh Tank — Black
description: Engineered support with a sleek finish. Elevated basics for elevated taste.

name: Neon Harness
description: Clean strap work, durable clips, and a serious fit. Built to move with you.

name: Leather Cuffs Set
description: Polished hardware, reinforced stitching, and a luxe feel. Premium without the precious.

name: Travel Dopp Kit
description: Smooth, structured, and sharp—like the outfit you planned three days in advance.

name: Limited Drop Tee
description: Statement piece energy with everyday comfort. Add-to-cart bait, basically.

name: Digital Gift Card
description: Limited-run vibe with premium texture. Once it’s gone… it’s gone.
